items.title: How to Protect Your Company From the Worst Effects of Social Media
items.description: TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest can be huge distractions at work. Other social content can derail team collaboration.

items.title: Reid Hoffman and David Sacks Are Feuding on X Over AI and ‘Dirty Tricks’
items.description: Hoffman recently opened up to Inc. about technology’s role in politics and his vision for AI regulation.

items.title: Gold Investors May Suddenly Be Rotating Into Bitcoin
items.description: Gold prices fell while bitcoin climbed sharply.

items.title: The Role of Entrepreneurship in Low-Income Communities
items.description: Majora Carter, a real estate developer and urban revitalization strategy consultant, is proof that you don’t have to leave to succeed.

items.title: Why High Performers Build Smaller Networks, Backed By Organizational Science
items.description: While correlation isn’t always causation, research shows the bigger your network, the less likely you are to succeed.
